divs: sighting detailsi stepped outside and noticed a very large orange glow to my left. i saw this "acorn-shaped" object growing in size- hovering over the rooftops. it was transparent on the bottom half. i ran inside and grabbed my sony handycam hi8-- and yelled for my girlfriend to come see. by the time i started filming, it was already moving away and shrinking. here is a link to the video: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=jg4fyb7tzb0 i am a mufon f.i. here in miami and would like to be assigned this\my case. i had forgotten to report this sighting afterwards because i was a little stunned by the whole thing. i've emailed mary margaret informing her of my(this) sighting. my ssd is bland p. thank you alexander lugones
